name: FxAnalysisAPI
desc: A protocol that host applications implement to provide information to plug-ins that support the FxAnalyzer protocol.

items.name: func analysisStateForEffect() -> FxAnalysisState
items.desc: Fetches the state of frame analysis for your plug-in.

items.name: func startForwardAnalysis(FxAnalysisLocation)
items.desc: Requests that the application begin a forwards analysis of a clip from start to end.

items.name: func startBackwardAnalysis(FxAnalysisLocation)
items.desc: Requests that the application begin a backwards analysis of a clip from end to start.
